prompt: Delete the word 'bag' from the text 'Handmade Gift bag' while keeping the font style, color, and alignment unchanged
knowledge_prompt:
Deleting the word “bag” requires the model to understand that the removal simplifies the brand name without altering its overall meaning — the phrase “Handmade Gift” still conveys the same product concept.
The semantic expectation is that the resulting text should remain natural and grammatically correct, while maintaining consistent font weight, alignment, and spacing so that the logo’s visual balance and aesthetic integrity are preserved.
